text: Ojo [kofiron] ʙa osmonu zamine, ki pesi ru va pusti sarason ast, nanigaristaand? Agar ʙixohem, ononro [monandi Qorun] dar zamin furu meʙarem jo [hamcun qavmi Suajʙ] tikkae az osmonro ʙar sarason meafkanem. Be gumon, dar in [husdor] ʙaroi har ʙandai tavʙakor, nisonae [az qudrati Alloh taolo] ast
